sub_title: Solution Architect at Salesforce | Successfully delivering Global Salesforce Implementations
summary:
Professional with a passion for large scale business transformations enabled through next generation CRM and customer facing business capabilities. I focus on identifying and delivering customer facing solutions, optimizing processes and data, enabling company to achieve its growth aspirations while delivering value to customers.

Key strengths and specialties:
•	Experienced and meticulous Salesforce.com Solution Architect and Management Advisor in customer facing positions with strong stakeholder/relationship management skills.
•	Strong consulting, delivery and project management skills to deliver projects within time and budget, managing business system projects with strong drive for results.
•	Team player with a "can do" mentality, comfortable leading/coaching cross-cultural and -functional team members.
•	Very comfortable communicating technical and business information efficiently to both technical and non-technical people across all levels of the organization.
•	Industry knowledge: Telecom, Insurance & Banking, Consumer Goods, Agribusiness and Human Resources & Recruitment.
•	Academic background: Degree in Philosophy, Communication Science and Journalism and diploma in Mathematics and Informatics. 
•	Personal background: Passionate about painting, history, astronomy and travelling.

"Imagination is more important than knowledge" Albert Einstein

education.degree_name: Vocational Diploma in Informatics (BTEC/ NVQ equivalent)

education.field_of_study: Mathematics and Informatics Diploma de Baccalaureate

For demonstrating commitment to learning the new skillset required.
awards.issuer: Change, Communication and Education Lead GOSCE

awards.title: Brand Ambassador Award
awards.description: For demonstrating relentless determination, by showing initiative, result orientation, delivering on promise

certifications.name: Salesforce Certified Sharing and Visibility Architect
Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder Certification

profile_positions.description:
As a Salesforce.com Advisor I help my clients in their business transformations and in high performing with their own customers. I focus on understanding my client's business needs, their goals and challenges and identify how technology can best respond to these needs and be an enabler for their growth. 

My experiences include Salesforce.com Solution Design for Sales, Service and Marketing Cloud | Management Advisory | Project Delivery | Project Management | Analytical & Strategic Thinking | Communication, Presentation & Public Speaking | Change Management & User Adoption | Agile/Scrum & Waterfall |
profile_positions.title: Sales, Service & Marketing Cloud Sr. Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Leading the transformation of customer facing capabilities for EMEA region, collaborating across CASC EMEA to identify and deliver customer-facing technology solutions. Focused on getting the value out of the Salesforce.com and SAP Business Object turn the investment into a recognized strategic business tool while monitoring the user adoption. Working closely with the regional commercial teams to understand their needs, challenges and issues and advice on solutions that fit the unique business needs. Focused on developing and exploiting new technologies in order to contact/connect more efficiently with the customer segments or markets.

Responsibilities:
* Establish relationship with the external customers and partners to learn and identify potential customer facing solutions and develop solutions to enable the commercial teams to capture new customer business or lock customers into repeatable business.
* Champion connectivity with internal Commercial teams, I/T teams and other internal/external stakeholders in EMEA region to develop cost effective customer facing tools that meet business and customer needs.
* Applied rigorous project management discipline to all initiatives with clear benefits and ROE projections and pro-actively collected and shared best practices or success stories that leverage the company and industry best practices in technology to create and deliver solutions that meet customer needs and differentiate our offerings from our competitors.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Marketing Specialist - Business Analyst & Technology Lead EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Leading the transformation of customer facing capabilities, identifying and delivering customer-facing solutions for Grain and Oilseed Supply Chain Europe in alignment with Process Data and Technology strategy in place.

Responsibilities:
* Partner with different business stakeholders, global and local teams to develop vision and strategically aligned roadmaps for the implementation of initiatives, conduct assessments on feasibility of existing solutions, to develop and implement “Ease of Doing Business with our customers, suppliers and partners”
* Ensure scalable business support model and governance framework
* Engaged in structured communication with external customers, third party customer relations solutions providers, market research companies to understand market tendencies and offerings to the clients and available solutions
* Advise business on options, risks and costs versus benefits of various solutions
* Facilitate implementation of new solution by supporting training sessions, demos, proof of concept/blueprinting
* Manage workload and priorities to deliver agreed capabilities upon project milestones
* Responsible for holding project team resources accountable to their deliverables and ensure project execution
* Coordinating design, build, test and deployment of solution through iterative delivery methodology
* Maintain continuity and coordination between business and global and regional teams throughout complete software development and project life cycle
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Manager - Customer Facing Lead Europe

profile_positions.description:
Govern tactical developments, working with internal and external Salesforce.com development teams to implement approved technology changes.First point of contact at regional level for CRM stakeholders to collect and prioritize requirements, deliver support and provide training on Salesforce.com.

Active member of the Center Of Expertise across region and platform.

Responsibilities:
* Liaison between business stakeholders, key users and development team
* Responsible for the delivery approach/planning and execution
* Gathering/analyzing requirements and plan sales cloud scope against project timelines
* Coordinating design, build, test and deployment of solution through iterative delivery methodology
* Provide Quality Assurance on all developed solutions
* Maintaining users and administrating users’ roles, security and profiles. 
* Provide day-to-day troubleshooting, support and lead training.  
* Performing Data load using different API tools and implement and integrate third-party products/ applications on the Salesforce.com platform
* Creating supporting technical documentation and detailed design specifications
* Staying current with the periodic Salesforce.com releases and leverage the updates applicable to the business unit
profile_positions.title: Salesforce.com Coordinator and System Administrator Europe

profile_positions.description:
Part of Aghorizons Romania, responsible for sales force and merchant team support during sales & purchase processes.

Responsabilities:
* Administrated Crop Input orders and pre-orders and Origination contracts and managed all sell-purchase contracts into database in order to balance acquisitions of seed products and sales. 
* Issued commodity position reporting, sales-purchase reporting, daily and monthly reporting and analysis.
* Originated Credit and Market limit request management and supported Sales, Credit and Management Team in end to end approval process. 
* Key contact for Sales Team for credit execution activities: limits available, pledges, guarantees, exposure.
* Support in ensuring the contracts flow between departments and conduct weekly internal audits on existing documentation.
* Maintained and developed customer and supplier relationships.
* Actively involved as key user into new ERP implementation and supported technology solution design and functions to ensure they meet local business processes.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Part of Crop Input Romania, responsible to support sales force team and Crop Input Line Lead Seeds. Acting as Crop Input Seed Product Line Junior Lead in back to back business.

Responsabiltities:
* Managed all sell-purchase contracts into database and supported in balance acquisitions of seed products and sales.
* Participated to negotiation sessions with suppliers/producers and supported in setting up the sales season approach, documentation and launching of acquisition orders.
* Worked cross-functionally with Sales and Supply Chain teams to coordinate, prioritize and schedule deliverables and execution of Seed purchase orders.
* Monitored daily Crop Input warehouse activity, contract execution, accuracy of transition and payment of acquisition contracts.
* Guided Field Representatives through commercial policy and advised on seed products characteristics. 
* Assisted business stakeholders in the month end PNL estimate reporting process and accrual process.
* Supported sales team and credit team in credit approval process and pledges registration.
* Centralized other data requested from the Field Representatives and conducted analysis.
* Maintained and developed customer and supplier relationships.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Part of Finance Team Romania, responsible of Account Payable – SG&A activities.

Responsibilities:
* Issued accounting notes using U.S. accounts for proper accounting of the statutory (in JDE).
* Registered costs and followed approval and payment process.
* Prepared monthly expenses and recharge invoices.
* Issued internal and external invoices
* Managed data input and output of payments between domestic companies and maintaining collaboration with the contacts of other Cargill internal and external branches.
profile_positions.title: Junior Accountant

Responsibilities:
* Develop clients’ portfolio

* Perform and consult clients on comparative presentation of banking partners products
* Issuing and following the credit approval flow
